steps.name:
【发起请求】地址：
 http://129.28.122.208:8089/admin/login, 参数：{"username":"test","password":"123456"}, 方法：post

parameters.name: caseInfo

steps.name:
【数据库查询与断言】SQL：SELECT COUNT(*) 
FROM ums_admin_login_log l
JOIN ums_admin a ON l.admin_id = a.id
WHERE a.username = 'test';
，请求前记录数：87，请求后记录数：88

parameters.name: sql
parameters.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) 
FROM ums_admin_login_log l
JOIN ums_admin a ON l.admin_id = a.id
WHERE a.username = 'test';

steps.name:
【最终用例测试结果】是否通过：CaseInfo{caseId=1, caseDesc='登录成功', url='

FROM ums_admin_login_log l
JOIN ums_admin a ON l.admin_id = a.id
WHERE a.username = 'test';
'}，用例执行结果：true
